WRITING.TITLE: Insecure Body Shaming MIL
WRITING.TEXT: I could use some advice and DWIL Nation forums were too mean for me. Let me preface this by saying I don't want to cut my MIL off. I only see her maybe x4 a year because my husband has agreed to limit my contact with her. And when I DO see her its in a larger family setting so I do not interact with her much. The issue is my mother in law brings up my weight CONSTANTLY. I am 153 pounds she is about 190-220. My SIL (her daughter) is easily 250-300. Its become quite awkward for me because she will obsess about "my figure" to anyone who will listen to her. Comments include as follows: When I ordered a salad "Oh wait until you are eating for 2!!" "Shes just trying to look good" to my mother when my mother complimented my weight loss at my wedding. My mother was FURIOUS and hasn't spoken to her since. "I'm trying to look like THAT" pointing to me at a family Christmas get together. It was so embarrassing and made her look insane. "Wait until you have a baby!" When I lost 10 pounds one summer for my job (cannot say what I do because it will give me away) Then she'll put down her and her daughter "We only feed the girls in my family" And what really bugged me is they came to my house last summer (this has since stopped) and my MIL pulled me a side and said "Can you tell SIL she looks great? She lost 13 pounds." She gave my husband "leftover" chips cookies cakes and everything she knows I like when I was on a 3 day cleanse. Funny thing was I have IBS and was "fasting" on veggie juice to heal my stomach not loose weight. I didn't eat a bite of it but found it funny she assumed it was for vanity and not health. When I hit 153 last summer and she saw me she kept repeating "You lost weight" "You lost so much weight" and its literally the only thing she talks about. How do I make her stop obsessing about my weight? I've thought about saying "If you worry less about my body and more about yours you would be happier." Or "Why are you so obsessed with my body? Its f***ng creepy." And finally "If you keep talking about my body, I'm leaving." And walking out of the family gathering. Thoughts?

WRITING.TITLE: The Nose in my 'Weight Loss'
WRITING.TEXT: Has this been taken as a MIL name yet? Mine is quite nosey and prides herself in knowing things about you. Our family get together is quickly approaching and I've lost 7ish pounds due to my job that's mostly walking as well as eating right and regular exercising to self manage my anxiety. I look like I've lost twice that because I'm built like Rhonda Rousey (muscular). She wants to know what I have done to loose weight. Do I owe her a response? If I tell her what I'm doing she will turn it into a competition and I have no interest in competing with a post menopausal woman, especially not the one who [failed to] raise my husband. How should I respond to the "'What have you been dooingggg's?" DH insists these are complimentary but for the women out there who have bee through this we known better. I want to say "Thinking of you and being unable to eat." But coming out the gate aggressive will backfire since her team of FMs will be there. Will "Thank you for the compliment" work?

WRITING.TITLE: MIL sent GFIL to Mow My Grass
WRITING.TEXT: This took place years ago about 8 months into my brand new marriage husband and I had new jobs, new schedules, a new home, and were still getting "used to" each other and were fighting a lot. I think MIL smelled blood. She would constantly bring up "graaaandbabiezz" and my husband and I would shoot her down. She did group tactics to "shame us" into kids at family reunions, run behind the other's back like a child to "hint" and when I would tell husband and he would call her to yell at her she would say "subject280 is too sensitive I was joking about being at her delivery room and having GFIL film it!!" So now we have FMGFIL. He is MILs father and is basically the Jedi who trained MIL. Hes also the biggest pain in the ads I've ever met. Helpless worthless waste of space. On top of this we had HIS mother GGMIL and his wife MILs mother GMIL. Bot were nasty bitches, codependent on GFIL. Around this time GGMIL and GMIL died 2 months apart. GFIL was naturally devastated and being new to the narc game I DID feel bad. Well MIL smelled the blood and approached husband and I in front of an audience with GFIL in tow and states "He is just SO LONELY and LOVES to mow grass" so husband and I agreed stupidly to let this FM into my home where he would bust up our lawn mower, our septic tank, and as soon as we were alone in the kitchen would hound me about grandbabies grandbabies grandbabies. Basically MIL had HIM coming to my house once a week on a work night hounding me for him. Stupid me allowed this for 2 summers. On one occasion he "accidently" let the dogs out and I had to chase them over 2 miles because they're hunting dogs. On another occasion he dug for information on my "weight" (my MILs obsession) and I finally told my husband "When we purchase a new mower hes out" and husband agreed. Now every holiday when I see this shriveled flying monkey he has the nerve to tell me with a CBF "I miss mowing MY grass". YOUR GRASS? Yours?!?!? You fucking prune...my theory is MIL wanted husband to move him in with us because we have a step in shower and live in a 1 story home. He was also a school teacher so in their heads "if they have kids GFIL can be free childcare because they will neeeeed hiiimmm and he is faaaaaamily and sooo loonneeely"

My husband responded "We aren't coming" To which she whined: "But its GFIL's biiirrrrttthhhddaaay!" To which husband replied:"Oh, then we are DEFINITELY not coming." To say it was satisfying is an understatement.

WRITING.TITLE: The Nose At The Bridal Shower
WRITING.TEXT: This happened 3 years ago when I first got married. I thought this was the place to unpack it. So I did not WANT a bridal shower. MySometimesNo mother decides I was having one. She, her best friend who is like an aunt to me/mother of MY best friend, my sister and even my brother worked and had food done/games planned in 2 days. My mother calls me and states "Your MIL keeps texting me 3 times a day asking to help and won't take "we have it all done" for an answer. What the #247;* #247;* #215; do I do?" Stupid me says "Ask her to make a dish so she shuts up." MIL invites herself to my mothers house to arrange her dish. Of course immediately starts rearranging things and my mom has to tell her several times "NO" My parents called me. My Dad who is stoic and usually silent was like "This woman is a bitch." The day of my bridal shower MIL invites GFIL "to sit in the back room" since he droce GMIL and GreatGMIL. MIL proceeds to try to make it a day for GreatMIL to get the attention off of me. My friends and family are there all happy for me. MIL is jealous. CBF the whole day. My mothers friend and I do BeachBody workouts and we have both been obease in the past. We were taking about the latest program and my MIL says *to my mothers face* "Oh...LaneAnie is just in 'bride mode'." My mom had watched me struggle with my weight my whole life. My mom gives a speech. Halfway through a teary eyed part my MIL stands up, barks over my mom "We love LaneAnie too." My mom and her friend were speechlessly pissed. GMIL kept mistaking me for "my twin sister" I dont HAVE a twin guys!! Gift opening time. MIL snatches every open gift out of my hands to inspect it despite the fact my friend is keeping track of the gift/who sent it. I got a check, guys, she ripped it out of my hands to see how much her husbands realtive had given me/her son! At the end my moms other friend pulls me aside and says "subject280...What the fuck is wrong with your MIL?" Reports came back from guests that they were extremely uncomfortable with the way she acted the whole time. And of COURSE weight obsessed sister in law "Couldn't get the day off of work." To bother to come. I strongly suspect she was mad because H and I had been engaged and her long time boyfriend was dragging his feet. My mother says "When its time for a baby shower MIL isnt welcome."

You are SO RUDE!" (This makes me look insane which furthers MILs narrative) Or I could flip the script. Get them to tell me about their pregnancies and then as they're talking cut them off and say "Thats nice" and walk away.

What I do is I wait 12 hours to answer a text from someone who is text-until-you-respond-to-me. This "trains" them if you will, to stop harassing you. If you delay gratification *consistently* then they will stop. She sounds like she has anxiety. My sometimes NoMom has it and it went untreated for years. Ive forgiven her and moved on but I trained her this way to quit obsessively calling and texting. It has worked. And you can be kind about it. I said "Mom, calling me constantly scares me because I think something is wrong. How about you wait 2 hours before calling me or texting me in case I am cooking and doing dishes or in the bath and can't get to my phone? Sometimes my hands arent clean enough to text back." And that was enough for her to realize "She's NOT ignoring me. Her hands are covered in raw chicken, dish soap, ECT" and it helped change the destructive obsessive thoughts she was having. (That was a side effect...I'm not promising you that will happen in your case)

Yes you go to the department and express you would like to report your MIL is threatening you. In my experience they may press charges. To help you play nice: Stop resenting her for being a bad mother to your husband. You can't change it and her failures made your man the man that you love. Do not let her have a foothold by allowing her to be mean and just taking her abuse. I will use a common statement as an example: MIL: "MY kids never acted like THAT." You: "Really? Or, if you want to take a baby step: "Considering I am not you and my kids are not your kids, it makes sense to me that they would act completely different. Oh, MIL! You are preaching to the choir. I mean no judgement. I just wanted to make sure you realized that this woman is not being normal gracious or kind. The best way to handle women like her is to allow your actions, or lack of actions, do the speaking. When she says something hurtful, walk away. If she does something stupid/cruel ignore it. If she says or does something kind, interact with her. Say "thank you" or something. Its called operant conditioning. When you dont give her any response positive or negative she gets no reward. When you interact with her you are rewarding her so only reward good behavior.

She wore the purple one...and about 2 months later Honey Boo Boo's mom wore the same fucking one in black on the red carpet. No lie. Google Mama June black dress barn dress. Oh but that isn't the end of it. 2 years later I tell H about this on our way to GMIL (FILs Mom) thanksgiving. Husband instantly believes me and I explained I never told him because I was afraid to cause drama. So mind you only Me H and MIL know what happened. So at thanksgiving BIL and SIL are discussing their upcomming wedding. BIL jokes he wants a white tux and SIL wants a black dress because they love trolling MIL. Well AIL...FILs brother's wife...pipes up and says "Honestly as long as MIL doesn't wear white that should be fine becauae thats really disrespectful to a bride." Guys. "I remember it being mauve." I just keep picturing honey boo boos mom when I see my wedding photos. And now everytime I ask for anything white in front of MIL I refer to it as mauve. As in "please hand me that mauve paper plate." Its a joke only she and I are privy to.

WRITING.TITLE: Success
WRITING.TEXT: Today was the fateful day of MIL and her FM party and through a combination of techniques taught here I won my way through a family reunion of MIL and her FM team. When MIL started trying to draw me into weight loss talk I grey rocked. Cousin in law went rouge and bragged about her weight loss and workouts...cue CBF and "We hate you" comments from MIL. Hahaha. Didn't even have to open my mouth! THEN MILs #1 FM GFIL tried to guilt me and made comments about "it would be nice to see us more often" Husband and I didn't respond and walked away. No MIL, we are done accepting hlep from GFIL/allowing him access to snoop in our home!!! Also was able to distribute my phone number to in-laws I dont hate so MIL no longer gets to play gate keeper between me and extended in-laws!!! So NOW I have direct communication vs going through MIL. Hehehe! It was a phenomenal success and I could not have done it without this sub. I do believe I can put all of her crap behind me and move on....meaning I never trust her again BUT I focus now on ME and MY joy vs stressing over "how to deal with crazy pants". I got her in the bag. I'm in charge now! Thank you everyone!
I feel light and glowing. I feel so tranquil. I have 0 vengeance thoughts just true peace.

Isnt it great? Mine was a small thing but this way I can side step SO much drama and unnecessary issues by just picking up my phone and asking what is needed for a get together, so I no longer have to go through MIL and have my words twisted!

I read "Nice Girl Syndrom" "You Can Heal Your Life" "If You Had Controlling Parents" "Don't Let Anyone Dull Your Sparkle" and "Assertiveness For Earth Angels" and started doing free yoga videos online. We store emotions in our muscles and to loosen them up was like taking a huge breath of fresh air. I also researched nutrition and started making dietary decisions best for my bosy, implemented vitamins and supplements, and started meal prepping/making dinner from scratch and learned new recipes. I started delving into religion on my own, and I have found it is harder for people to hurt me when I am treating myself with respect and love every day and attending to my own needs.

Many times a MIL will take her anger out on us, because prior to our arrival certain negative aspects of her realtionship with her son aren't visible. When we arrive we accidently bring attention to the fact that he and his mom were never close, he actually never liked his mom much, and his mother is controlling/manipulative. Or we highlight a MILs insecurities, we are younger prettier and have the ability to do in life what we want. A JustNoMIL has death and grandchildren to be excited for. You can't manipulate your way into a bedroom for your DIL to get pregnant, and you can't manipulate your way out of death/aging. You also loose your power as grandchildren want their mom not you and instinctively pull away from an overbearing controlling grandmother. Your son you once had power over doesn't listen and your DIL has a different way of doing everything so you can't control her either. A JustNo is the equivilant of a large lion who's teeth are falling out and has mange. And if we don't give them any good or bad response then that takes more of their power away. We are the new lions in town and MIL can't accept her new role in the herd.

Hi! Me! My mother was...tried to be...fundy. My father was passive and let her do what she wanted so she quit her job pulled us out of school and rammed every focus on the family book/tape down our throats. Dating was forbidden every friend we brought home was bad mouthed Pokemon were demons cartoon and television were evil sex was for chidlren and marriage. We were only allowed around the fundy or extreme Baptists. We were allowed to wear pants and makeup which alienated us from our fundy homeschooled "friends" but were not accepted by our evangelical church eithet for being too awkward. It was abusive oppressive and just down right imprisonment in that house. I spent my childhood and teen years alone in my room with no friends. I was suicidal and self harmed. I thought I was being influenced by demons but it was my mother. Ironically to escape I graduated college and became a corrections officer to escape the prison I was already in. Its very hard for me to relate to everyone else as movie/television references go right over my head. I spent college reading Wikipedia to figure out who Darth Vader was to relate to my peers. I fake my way through social situations. Dating was impossible. I finally married and my new husband dealt with constant panic attacks the first 2 years of our marriage from all the suppressed emotions. Part of me thought marriage was my only escape. My lack of ability to pick up on social cues played me into the hands of a few predatory men at college. I was stalked, sexually assaulted, it was somehow my fault when I told my mother who told me to keep quiet about it. Happy ending though I figured out everybody's family is fucked up in their own way and now my parents don't even attend church. My mother has been reduced to a miserable old lonely lady who is always the victim and pushes all her friends away. My sister and I have no relationship because of the competition in our house growing up she would verbally and physically abuse me. My brother is dependent on me for emotional support because of the damage done to him. Having lived in an abusive oppressive environment it makes working in a jail easy. Ive told 4 people about my childhood. Its still uncomfortable to talk about. There is a lot of judgement.

Respectfully disagree. Parents can encourage competition and hatefulnes among their children in dysfunctional homes. I lived it. My mother 100 percent is the reason my sister hates me. I recently found out my mother had been whispering how much prettier and smarter I was then her.
